sections.story_beat: First layer of the system â€” figure out what makes you different and say it clearly
sections.content:
Most people sound like everyone else.

Same bio. Same content. Same vague promises.

You need two things to stand out: an unfair advantage people can see, and a one-liner that makes them want to follow you.

This layer gives you both.

---

Prompt 1: Unfair Advantage Finder

This prompt finds what makes you different. Not what you think is special. What the market will actually care about.

Copy this into ChatGPT or Claude:

"I help [who you help] with [what you do]. My background: [list your experience, skills, industries you've worked in, results you've gotten]. Find 3 unfair advantages I have that competitors can't easily copy. Make them specific and provable."

Example output:
- You worked at Apple for 10 years (credibility no one else has)
- You built a system that cut research time by 80% (specific result)
- You grew to 110K followers with zero ad spend (proof of method)

Pick the one that makes people think "I want what they have."

---

Prompt 2: One-Liner Generator

This turns your advantage into a bio people read and click Follow immediately.

Copy this:

"My unfair advantage: [paste the one you picked]. Write 5 different one-liner bios that show this advantage. Make them short. Make them concrete. No fluff. Show the outcome, not the process."

Example output:
- Built 110K followers in 12 months. Zero ads. Here's the system.
- I turn your expertise into content that brings you clients.
- Former Apple creative. Now I teach people to build audiences with AI.

Pick the one that sounds most like you.

---

Now you know what to say. Here's how to say it without spending 10 hours a week.

sections.title: âš¡ Layer 2: Content Engine
sections.story_beat: Second layer â€” create a week of content in one sitting using 4 prompts
sections.content:
Content takes time because you start from scratch every day.

Blank page. Blinking cursor. What do I say today?

This layer gives you 4 prompts that create content faster than you can manually. You'll make a week of posts in one sitting.

---

Prompt 3: Hook Generator

This writes 10 first lines designed to stop the scroll.

Copy this:

"Topic: [what you want to post about]. Write 10 hooks for this topic. Make them short. Make them surprising. Use these patterns: bold claim, question that makes them curious, story opening, contrarian take, specific number."

Example output:
- Most people waste 10 hours a week on content. Here's how to do it in one.
- I grew to 110K followers without posting every day. Here's what I did instead.
- You don't need more content. You need better distribution.

Pick the one that makes you want to keep reading.

---

Prompt 4: Carousel Outliner

This turns one idea into a 5-10 slide carousel in 3 minutes.

Copy this:

"Topic: [your topic]. Hook: [paste the hook you picked]. Create a carousel outline with 7 slides. Slide 1: the hook. Slides 2-6: one idea per slide, each builds on the last. Slide 7: clear takeaway. Keep each slide to 1-2 sentences max."

Example output:
Slide 1: I built 110K followers in 12 months. Zero ads.
Slide 2: Most people post and pray. I built a system.
Slide 3: Layer 1: Position yourself so people want to follow.
Slide 4: Layer 2: Create content in batches, not daily.
Slide 5: Layer 3: Post once, show up on 6 platforms.
Slide 6: The system compounds. Every post works harder.
Slide 7: Build once. Distribute everywhere.

Drop this into Canva. You have a carousel.

---

Prompt 5: Video Script

This writes a 60-second script you can read on camera.

Copy this:

"Topic: [your topic]. Write a 60-second video script. Start with a hook that stops the scroll. Middle: one clear point with a specific example. End: one-sentence takeaway. Write it like I'm talking to a friend. Short sentences. No fluff."

Example output:
"Most people think you need to post every day to grow. You don't. I post 3 times a week and grew to 110K followers in a year. Here's what I do instead: I create one piece of content and turn it into 6. One video becomes a carousel, a thread, a LinkedIn post, a newsletter. Same idea, different formats. You're not creating more. You're distributing smarter. Build once. Show up everywhere."

Read it on your phone. Post it as a Reel.

---

Prompt 6: Voice Calibration

This makes AI sound like you, not a robot.

Copy this:

"Here are 3 things I've written: [paste 3 of your posts, emails, or tweets]. Analyze my voice. Tell me: sentence length, word choice, tone, how I structure ideas. Then rewrite this post in my voice: [paste a draft]."

Example output:
"Your voice: Short sentences. Concrete examples. You say 'Here's what I did' not 'Here's what you should do.' You use numbers and proof, not adjectives. You write like you talk."

Now every post sounds like you wrote it.

---

You've got content. Now make it show up everywhere.

sections.title: ðŸš€ Layer 3: Distribution
sections.story_beat: Third layer â€” take one piece of content and show up on 6 platforms with 2 prompts
sections.content:
You create good content. No one sees it.

Why? Because you posted it once, on one platform.

This layer makes one post work six times harder.

---

Prompt 7: Multi-Platform Repurposer

This takes one post and rewrites it for every platform you use.

Copy this:

"Here's my post: [paste your content]. Rewrite this for: LinkedIn (professional, 3 paragraphs), Twitter (thread, 5 tweets), Instagram (caption, 2200 characters, story-driven), TikTok (script, 45 seconds), YouTube (description, 150 words). Keep the core idea the same. Change the format and tone for each platform."

Example output:
LinkedIn: Starts with a question, 3 short paragraphs, ends with a takeaway.
Twitter: Hook tweet, 3 supporting tweets with examples, closing tweet with CTA.
Instagram: Story opening, emotional middle, clear lesson at the end.
TikTok: 10-second hook, 20-second explanation, 15-second takeaway.
YouTube: SEO-friendly description with timestamps and keywords.

You post once. You show up on 6 platforms.

---

Prompt 8: Weekly Calendar

This plans your whole week in 5 minutes.

Copy this:

"I want to post [number] times this week. Platforms: [list them]. My topic focus: [what you help with]. Create a weekly content calendar. Show me: what to post, which platform, and what format. Make sure each post supports the others and builds momentum."

Example output:
Monday: LinkedIn carousel on positioning
Tuesday: TikTok video using the carousel idea
Wednesday: Twitter thread expanding on one slide
Thursday: Instagram post with a client story
Friday: YouTube short summarizing the week's ideas

You're not guessing. You have a plan.

---

7-Day Quick Start

Here's how to use this system starting today:

Day 1: Run Unfair Advantage Finder and One-Liner Generator. Update your bio on every platform.

Day 2: Run Hook Generator. Pick your 3 favorite hooks. These become your next 3 posts.

Day 3: Take hook 1. Run Carousel Outliner. Create the carousel. Post it.

Day 4: Take the same carousel idea. Run Video Script. Record it. Post as a Reel or TikTok.

Day 5: Run Multi-Platform Repurposer on your carousel. Schedule the outputs for next week.

Day 6: Run Weekly Calendar for the following week. You now have a plan.

Day 7: Run Voice Calibration on 3 old posts. Save the voice analysis. Use it every time you create content.

In 7 days you'll have: a new bio, 2 pieces of content posted, 6 pieces scheduled, and a system you can repeat every week.

People will start DMing you asking how you can help them.
